Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Jong So Chon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Jong So Chon
   Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent a wreath to the bier of the late writer Jong So Chon, Kim Il Sung Prize winner, on Friday to express deep condolences upon his death.

articles.title: Congratulations to Colombian Foreign Minister
articles.content:
Congratulations to Colombian Foreign Minister
   Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a congratulatory message to Maria Consuelo Araujo Castro upon her appointment as foreign minister of Colombia.
 The message expressed the conviction that the ties of friendship existing between the two countries would grow stronger and wished the foreign minister success in her new job.
